CustomField.description: The Payment Method for the Schedule. It must belong to the Customer associated with the Subscription and be in a chargeable state. If not set, defaults to the Customer's default Payment Method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Payment Method for the Schedule. It must belong to the Customer associated with the Subscription and be in a chargeable state. If not set, defaults to the Customer's default Payment Method.
CustomField.label: Default Payment Method
